title: SlySoft AnyDVD HD 7.6.9.0 Multilingual Incl Key [SadeemPC].zip
description:
SlySoft AnyDVD HD 7.6.9.0 Multilingual | 12.1 MB

AnyDVD works in the background to automatically remove the copy protection of a DVD movie as soon as it's inserted into the drive, allowing you then to backup the movie using a DVD backup tool such as CloneDVD and CloneDVD mobile.	

Key Features:
â€¢ Works automatically in the background
â€¢ Removes encryption (CSS) and region code (RPC) from DVDs
â€¢ Removes analogue copy protection (Macrovision)
â€¢ Removes features such as forced subtitles and warnings
â€¢ Decrypts without the need to save the data onto your hard-disk
â€¢ Decrypts â€˜on the flyâ€™
â€¢ Prevents automatic launching of â€˜PC-friendlyâ€™ software on video DVDs
â€¢ Allows adjustment of your monitor refresh rate for both NTSC and PAL monitors
â€¢ Allows execution of external programs on disc insertion and removal
â€¢ Allows speed control of your DVD drives
â€¢ Compatible with all DVD media
â€¢ Works with all DVD-drives, regardless of region code
â€¢ Works with all DVD copying, such as CloneDVD, and all DVD player software
â€¢ Works transparently for the operating system: DVDs can be shared over the network and copied with the command prompt or with Windows Explorer, etc.
â€¢ Proven to be stable and fast and does not require an ASPI driver
â€¢ Features AnyCDDA: play, copy and rip protected audio CDs

System Requirements:
- IBM-compatible PC with a minimum 2 GHz Pentium-class microprocessor and 512 MB RAM
- Windows XP/XP64/VISTA/VISTA64/Win7/Win7-64/Win8/Win8-64
- For Blu-ray or HD DVD media, a Blu-ray or HD DVD compliant drive is required.
- For HD decryption and ripping, the minimum OS is Windows 2000 (latest SP).
- PC player software usually requires Windows XP SP2 as minimum OS.

What's New in AnyDVD 7.6.9.0:
- Fix (Blu-ray): Crash with certain discs
- Note: On Windows Vista and Server 2008, Update 2763674 must be installed
